about_the_game:
Congratulations! You've graduated from the Space Academy and are ready for your first mission—an internship at a remote outpost on the edge of the galaxy. The outpost is fully automated and everything seems routine... until it isn’t. Suddenly, you're stranded on a hostile planet, and the outpost is in ruins.

In Escape from the Abandoned Outpost, your mission is to search the desolate outpost and the dangerous planetary jungle for resources. Repair the outpost, upgrade your equipment, and fend off the hostile flora and fauna as you fight to survive and return to civilization.

  • Repair the outpost to secure your survival
  • Explore the dangerous planetary jungle
  • Upgrade your gear to overcome the planet’s challenges

Are you ready to face the unknown and make it out alive?

content_descriptors.notes: the game hero is trying to survive in the hostile jungle and needs to battle monsters they meet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Survive and escape the Abandoned Outpost in this hidden object adventure. Search, repair, and find your way back to civilization!
